ftbquests.chapter.pedestals_expanded.que: Filtering Pedestals[--过滤基座--]
How you filter can really make a difference.[--过滤器如何真正产生不同效果。--]
&bFilters&r allow you to choose what is and isn't allowed to go into a Pedestal.[--&b过滤器&r允许你选择什么是和什么是不能进入基座的.--]
Filters are configured similarly to Upgrades:[--过滤器的配置类似于升级:--]
• In offhand, &6sneak right-click&r to cycle through the types (item, fluid, etc)[--• 在副手,&6潜行右键&r通过类型(物品、流体等)循环--]
• In offhand, &6right-click&r to toggle if it's a blacklist or whitelist[--• 在副手,&6右键&r来切换黑名单或白名单--]

• In offhand, &6sneak right-click an inventory&r to set the filter to its contents. For example, clicking a Chest that has Dirt inside will set the filter to Dirt. Fluid Filters use filled Buckets.[--• 在副手,&6潜行并右键单击物品栏&r来设置其内容。例如,单击一个内部有泥土的箱子会将过滤器设置为泥土。流体过滤器使用填充的桶。--]
Filters may say \"Filter applies on X\".[--过滤器可以说“过滤器适用于X”。--]
• &6Inserting&r - what goes into the Pedestal[--•&6灌注&r - 进入基座--]
• &6Exporting&r - what goes out of the Pedestal[--•&6经验消耗&r - 基座产物--]
• &6Machines&r - what Upgrades can use[--•&6Machines&r - 哪些升级可以使用--]
Going with the flow[--顺其自然--]
Thee &bFluid Manipulation Upgrades&r assist with &6transporting&r, &6gathering&r, &6placing&r fluids, and more.[--&b流体处理升级&r可以帮助&6运输&r、&6收集&r、&6替换&r流体等等.--]
Fluid Manipulation Upgrades[--流体操作升级--]
These &bBlock Manipulation Upgrades&r can &6break and place blocks&r, either in a specific location or in an area.[--这些&b方块操作升级&r可以&6破坏并放置方块&r,或者在特定位置或者在一定区域内.--]
Block Manipulation Upgrades[--方块操作升级--]
Farming with Plants[--用植物耕种--]
For those with greener thumbs[--对于那些带绿指头的人--]
These &bFarming Upgrades&r will assist you with farming plants.[--这些&b护甲升级&r可以帮助你种植植物.--]
Farming Upgrades[--农业升级--]
Farming with Animals[--使用动物进行农业--]
Ranching 101[--放牧101--]
These &bRanching Upgrades&r will help you with farming mobs.[--这些&b扳手升级&r可以帮助你种植生物.--]
Ranching Upgrades[--牧场升级--]
Farming with Mobs[--使用怪物进行农业--]
Loot for DAYS!!![--天天战利品!!!--]
These &bMob Farm Upgrades&r can greatly assist you with &6moving and killing mobs&r, and making use of their drops.[--这些&b怪物农场升级&r可以极大地帮助你&6移动和杀死生物&r,并使用他们的掉落物.--]
Mob Farm Upgrades[--怪物农场升级--]
The most basic yet most useful filters.[--最基本但最有用的过滤器。--]
These are the most basic filters one can use.[--这些是可以使用的最基本过滤器.--]
Basic Filters[--基础过滤器--]
Filters Made for Enchantments[--为附魔制作的过滤器--]
These filters all specialize in filtering for various enchanted conditions[--这些过滤器都特别用于各种附魔条件的过滤--]
Enchanted Filters[--附魔过滤器--]
The most complex filters[--最复杂的过滤器--]
These filters are the most complex ones to setup, but by doing so that can really do some useful and unique things.[--这些过滤器是最复杂的设置,但这样做确实可以做一些有用和独特的事情。--]
Advanced Filters[--高级过滤器--]
Put you on a pedestal[--把你放在基座上--]
Rising to the occasion[--站出来!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!--]

&bPedestals&r are highly versatile magical devices. They can &6move items, fluids, and energy wirelessly&r, place and break blocks, &6from crops and animals&r, and more.[--&b基座&r是高度多功能的魔法设备。它们可以&6无线移动物品、流体和能量&r,放置和破坏方块,&6来自作物和动物&r等等.--]
An unupgraded Pedestal will &6pull from a linked Pedestal&r, but not much else. Additional functionality requires &6upgrades&r.[--一个未升级的基座会&6从连接的基座&r中拉出,但没有太多其他的.额外功能需要&6升级&r.--]
There are four ways to interact with a Pedestal:[--有四个方式可以与基座进行交互:--]
• &6Right clicking&r inserts an item (Upgrades and the like must be in the off-hand)[--•&6右键单击&r插入一个物品(升级等必须在副手)--]
• &6Sneak right clicking&r with an empty hand will display the contents[--•&6潜行右键单击&r空手显示内容--]
• &6Left clicking&r removes an item[--•&6左键单击&r移除物品--]
• &6Sneak left clicking&r removes a stack[--•&6潜行左键&r移除一组物品--]
The Pedestals 'Multi-Tool'[--基座“多功能工具”--]
The &bUpgrade Tool&r's main purpose is to &6remove Upgrades&r, but it is also a crafting component for them.[--&b升级工具&r的主要目的就是&6移除升级&r,但它也是它们的一种制作组件.--]
With the Upgrade Tool in your offhand, left click a Pedestal to remove its installed Upgrade.[--使用副手的升级工具,左键单击基座以移除其安装的升级。--]
Linking Tool[--链接工具--]
The Tool That Starts it All[--开启一切的工具--]
The &bLinking Tool&r is used to link Pedestals to each other.[--&b连接工具&r用于连接基座。--]

First, craft the Tool by surrounding an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r with the required items on &bArcane Pedestals&r then insert a &6Gold rod&r into the &bEnchanting Apparatus&r[--首先,通过&b附魔装置&r在&b奥术基座&r上使用所需的物品来制作工具,然后将&6金棒&r插入&b附魔装置&r--]
Check &2JEI&r for the recipe![--查看&2JEI&r的配方!--]
To link a Pedestal, sneak right-click on the &oreceiving&r Pedestal, then sneak right-click on the one you want to pull from.[--要连接基座,请潜行右键单击&oreaweing&r基座,然后潜行右键单击你想拉离的基座。--]
Upgrading Pedestals[--升级基座--]
Upgrades unlock the pedestals full potential[--升级解锁基座的全部潜能--]
&bUpgrades&r are installed onto a Pedestal to give them additional functionality.[--&b升级&r被安装在基座上以为他们提供额外的功能.--]
Upgrades are installed by &6right-clicking while held in the offhand&r.[--升级通过&6手持时&r右键单击&r来安装.--]
Coloring Pedestals[--着色基座--]
Pretty Colors[--漂亮的颜色--]
Dyes can be applied as an upgrade to &6color Pedestals&r.[--染料可以用作&6颜色基座&r的升级.--]
The &bColor Applicator&r can be used to quickly color Pedestals.[--&b装配器&r可用于快速染色基座.--]
Sneak right-click it on a Pedestal to save its color to the Applicator. Right-click other Pedestals to color them.[--潜行右键单击基座来将其颜色保存到施法器。右键其他基座来颜色.--]

The Applicator can store 8 colors. Cycle through by sneak right-clicking other blocks. Holding the Applicator in the offhand while placing Pedestals will automatically color them.[--应用器可以存储8种颜色。通过潜行右键单击其他方块来循环。在放置基座时将应用器手持在副手会自动给它们着色.--]
Lighting Up the Place[--闪闪发光--]
With &bGlowstone&r in your offhand, right-clicking a Pedestal will &6make it glow&r.[--在副手的&b荧石&r下,右键一个基座会&6让它发光&r.--]
Augmenting Pedestals[--扩展基座--]
Make an Augment[--做个扩展--]
&bAugments&r change how a Pedestal functions, in a different way than Upgrades.[--&b增强&r以与升级不同的方式改变基座的功能。--]
To craft an Augment, &6throw its ingredients&r on the ground then use a &6Linking Tool&r.[--要制作扩展,&6将其原料扔到地上&r然后使用&6连接工具&r.--]
Augments[--扩展--]
Make a Round Robin Augment[--做一个循环的Robin升级--]
Normally, when moving items etc, the Pedestal linked first gets first dibs.[--通常,当移动物品等时,先连接基座,然后获得第一个维度。--]

The &bRound Robin Augment&r changes that, so things are first sent to the first linked Pedestal, then the second linked Pedestal, and so on.[--&bRound Robin Assuption&r更改了这样的东西:先将物品发送到第一个连接基座,然后第二个链接基座,等等.--]
Make a Particle \\& Render Upgrade[--制作粒子POP渲染升级--]
The &bParticle and Render Augment&r will &6prevent parts of the Pedestal from rendering&r, to reduce lag.[--&b粒子和渲染升级&r将&6防止基座的一部分渲染&r,减少延迟。--]
Sneak right-click in the offhand to cycle through what is and isn't rendered.[--潜行右键右键在副手旋转,通过什么是和什么不是。--]
Make a Collision Effect Augment[--做个碰撞效果升级--]

The &bCollision Effect Augment&r will enable the &6Magnet&r and &6Import Upgrades&r to pull items, buckets, and xp from players touching the Pedestal.[--&b聚变效果升级&r将允许&6磁铁&r和&6输入升级&r从触摸基座的玩家身上提取物品、桶和xp.--]
Make a Transfer Augment[--做个传输扩展--]
These &bAugments&r make the Pedestal better at transferring items in some way. Each have 4 tiers, higher tiers being better[--这些&b增强&r可以让基座以某种方式更好传输物品。每个基座都有4个等级,更高的等级更好--]
&bCapacity&r increases the amount transported at a time.[--&b容量&r一次会增加传输量.--]
&bStorage&r increases the Pedestal's storage.[--&b存储&r增加基座的存储量.--]
&bSpeed&r decreases the time between transfers.[--&b速度&r减少传输之间的时间.--]
&bRange&r increases the linking range of the Pedestal.[--&b范围&r增加基座的连接范围.--]
Transfer Augments[--传输扩展--]
Upgrade Modification[--升级修改--]
The &bModification Infusion Upgrade&r is used to &6upgrade Upgrades&r.[--&b配置注魔升级&r用于&6升级升级&r.--]
Place a Pedestal &6on an inventory&r, and then place up to &69 other Pedestals nearby&r.[--将基座&6放在物品栏&r上,然后最多放置&69个附近的基座&r.--]

Link these Pedestals to the Upgrade, then install it on the Pedestal on the inventory. &6The order linked matters!&r The first one linked is the first \"slot\" in recipes.[--将基座连接到升级中,然后将其安装在库存基座上。&6顺序连接物质!&r第一个连接是配方中的第一个“线程”。--]

Place the Upgrade you wish to modify into the inventory, and place the modification ingredients into the appropriate Pedestals. If done correctly, the modified Upgrade will move to the inventory's Pedestal![--将您想要更改的升级放入容器,并将修改的原料放入合适的基座。如果操作正确,修改的升级会转移到容器基座上!--]
Pedestal Tank[--基座储罐--]
When a Pedestal has fluid in it, you can use a &bBucket&r to empty it manually.[--当基座有流体时,你可以使用&b桶&r手动清空它.--]
Tools In Pedestals[--基座中的工具--]
Enchantments[--附魔--]
The &6Material Generator&r simulates breaking blocks using a normal Stone Pickaxe. However, you can &bsupply your own and it'll use it&r instead.[--&6材料发电机&r用普通石镐模拟破坏方块。然而,你可以&b供应自己的材料,它会使用它&r.--]
Install a tool (like an enchanted Shovel) as you would an Upgrade, and remove it with the &6Tool Swapper&r.[--像安装升级一样安装一个工具(比如附魔锹),然后用&6工具交换器&r移除它.--]
If the block being broken is effected by an enchantment (Silk Touch, Fortune, etc), and if the supplied tool has that enchantment, it will be applied.[--如果被破坏的方块由附魔(精准采集,时运等)执行,如果提供的工具有该附魔,它就会被应用.--]
Tools[--工具--]
Moving Stuff Around[--移动物品--]
A large part of &ePedestals&r is the transport of items, fluids, energy, and experience.[--&e基座&r的主要部分是物品、流体、能量和经验的传输.--]
These &bTransport Upgrades&r allow the Pedestal to interact with &6items in the inventory they're placed on&r, or nearby &6item drops&r.[--这些&b运输升级&r允许基座与放置在&r上或附近的&6物品掉落物&r中的&6物品交互.--]
Transport Upgrades[--运输升级--]
Generating Material[--产能材料--]
Generating stuff out of thin air![--用薄空气产生东西!--]
The &bMaterial Generator&r will &6automaticaly generate various materials&r, based on certain factors.[--&b材料发电机&r会根据某些条件&6自动产生各种材料&r.--]
Its Pedestal must be &6placed on specific blocks&r, and it will passively generate a material based on that.[--它的基座必须&6放置在特定的方块上&r,它会被动地根据这个产生材料.--]

See its &6uses in JEI&r for a list of what blocks make what. A note: the block on the right &cis not what is generated&r. The Material Generator will simulate breaking that block, and generates the drops.[--在JEI&r中查看它的&6用法,了解哪些方块可以制造什么.一个提示:右侧的方块&cx而不是生成的东西&r.材料生成器将模拟破坏该方块,并产生掉落物.--]
'Swapped' Upgrade Tool Varient[--“Swapped”升级工具Varient--]
&6Sneak right-clicking Tools&r will swap them into other Tools. All of these are made either from each other or the Upgrade Tool.[--&6潜行右键单击工具&r会将其切换为其他工具。所有这些工具都是由彼此或升级工具制成的。--]
The &bTool Swapper&r removes a tool (in this context, Pickaxes etc) from a Pedestal.[--&b工具交换器&r从基座中移除一个工具(在此情况下,镐等)。--]
The &bFilter Tool&r removes a Filter from a Pedestal.[--&b过滤工具&r从基座上移除过滤器.--]
The &bTag Tool&r, when used in the mainhand, will display the item tags of what is held in the offhand.[--&bTag工具&r在主手中使用时,将显示副手所持物品的标签.--]
Tools[--工具--]
Upgrade Tips[--升级提示--]
Things you should know[--你应该知道的事--]
The &bWork Area&r of an Upgrade is set by sneak right-clicking it on opposite corners of the area. Sneak right-click air to reset it.[--升级的&b工作区域&r通过潜行右键单击区域对面的角落来设置。潜行右键单击空气来重置它.--]
&bWork Locations&r are set by right-clicking blocks in the world. Clicking air will clear the Upgrade.[--&b工作位置&r是用右键单击世界上的方块设置的。单击空气会清除升级.--]
For Upgrades that &btransfer multiple types&r (items and fluids, etc):[--用于&b传输多种类型的&r(物品和流体等):--]
• In offhand, sneak right-click to cycle through the types[--• 在副手,潜行右键来循环类型--]
• In offhand, right-click to enable/disable the current type[--• 在副手,右键单击以启用/禁用当前类型--]
